Keywords: Assassin , Mystical , Warp World , Weapon X
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
BLOOD FOR MEPHICTHTON!: Steal Energy, but may use it with close or range attacks.
CONTINGENCY CLAWS: When an opposing character would be dealt damage from Hellhound's [Mystics team ability], instead roll a d6 and deal that character penetrating damage equal to half the result.

Comments
August 12, 2021
Goop
He's good but 90 pts is a lot for a fig that opens with only toughness. I just don't see him living that long. I'm not sure if that super mystics damage and traited steal energy is worth the high cost. Rest of the dial has great stats and powers.
June 10, 2021
Dortmuner
I don't count Toughness as a reducer. I know it is one, but in my experience it's practically worthless. You've got these top dial monsters hitting you for 4, 5, and six points of damage and you get to shave one lousy point off that. I'd just as soon get a chance to evade or have a better chance to not get hurt in the first place than Toughness.
June 10, 2021
Coyote's Own
She has some reducers since sje starts with toughness.
June 10, 2021
Dortmuner
Contingency Claws being a trait is nasty. Who is going to want to hit him? I'd still want some reducers, but between steal energy on range or close and people just not wanting to hit him if they can avoid it, he should have a little staying power.
June 10, 2021
hoojeebo
This piece is SO my style!
